member.summary: Attribute allowing to define the corresponding permission needed for an resource endpoint.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: T:BlogCoreAPI.Authorization.PermissionHandlers.Dtos.HasOwnOrAllPermissionRangeForHasAuthorDtoAuthorizationHandler`1
member.summary: Authorization Handler that verifies if user has a role with or corresponding to the resource () and if it can realize the action it is asking ().
member.example: In case of , the user can realize on all . In case of , the user can realize only on its own (it is the author of this resource).

member.name: T:BlogCoreAPI.Authorization.PermissionHandlers.Dtos.HasOwnOrAllPermissionRangeForHasUserDtoAuthorizationHandler`1
member.summary: Authorization Handler that verifies if user has a role with or corresponding to the resource () and if it can realize the action it is asking ().
member.example: In case of , the user can realize on all . In case of , the user can realize only on its own (it is the author of this resource).

member.name: T:BlogCoreAPI.Authorization.PermissionHandlers.Dtos.HasOwnOrAllPermissionRangeForUserDtoAuthorizationHandler
member.summary: Authorization Handler that verifies if user has a role with or corresponding to the resource () and if it can realize the action it is asking ().
member.example: In case of , the user can realize on all . In case of , the user can realize only on its own (it is the author of this resource).

member.name: T:BlogCoreAPI.Authorization.PermissionHandlers.Resources.HasAllPermissionRangeAuthorizationHandler`1
member.summary: Authorization Handler used to authorize a resource when the have permission on this Type of resource.
member.example: user "ModeratorName" has a role that has the permission "PermissionRange.All, PermissionAction.Delete, PermissionTarget.Comment" => This handler requirement will succeed if this user ask authorization to delete a comment.

user "classicUser" doesn't have a role that has permission "PermissionRange.All, PermissionAction.Read, PermissionTarget.Role" => This handler requirement won't succeed if this user ask authorization to read (GET) a role.

member.summary: Cursor for pagination across multiple pages of results. Default value is 1.

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetCategoryQueryParameters.OrderBy
member.summary: Order the return categories by Ascending or Descending

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetCategoryQueryParameters.SortBy
member.summary: Sort the returned categories by the given parameter.

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetCategoryQueryParameters.InName
member.summary: Returns only categories whose name contains the given parameter

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetCategoryQueryParameters.MinimumPosts
member.summary: Returns only categories with a number of posts greater than or equal to the given parameter

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetCategoryQueryParameters.MaximumPosts
member.summary: Returns only categories with a number of posts less than or equal to the given parameter

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetCommentQueryParameters.OrderBy
member.summary: Order the return comments by Ascending or Descending

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetCommentQueryParameters.SortBy
member.summary: Sort the returned comments by the given parameter.

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetCommentQueryParameters.InAuthorUserName
member.summary: Returns only comments whose author's username contains the given parameter

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetCommentQueryParameters.InPostParentName
member.summary: Returns only comments whose parent post name contains the given parameter

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetCommentQueryParameters.InContent
member.summary: Returns only comments whose content contains the given parameter

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetLikeQueryParameters.OrderBy
member.summary: Order the return likes by Ascending or Descending

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetLikeQueryParameters.LikeableType
member.summary: Returns only the likes that are on posts **or** comments according to the given parameter

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetPostQueryParameters.OrderBy
member.summary: Order the return posts by Ascending or Descending

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetPostQueryParameters.SortBy
member.summary: Sort the returned posts by the given parameter.

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetPostQueryParameters.InName
member.summary: Returns only posts whose name contains the given parameter

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetPostQueryParameters.InContent
member.summary: Returns only posts whose content contains the given parameter

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetPostQueryParameters.FromPublicationDate
member.summary: Returns only posts whose publication date is more recent or equal to the given parameter

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetPostQueryParameters.ToPublicationDate
member.summary: Returns only posts whose published date is older or equal to the given parameter

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetPostQueryParameters.MinimumLikes
member.summary: Returns only posts with a number of likes greater than or equal to the given parameter

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetPostQueryParameters.MaximumLikes
member.summary: Returns only posts with a number of likes greater than or equal to the given parameter

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetPostQueryParameters.Tagged
member.summary: Returns only posts that have the specified tag given in the parameter

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetRoleQueryParameters.OrderBy
member.summary: Order the return roles by Ascending or Descending

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetTagQueryParameters.OrderBy
member.summary: Order the return tags by Ascending or Descending

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetTagQueryParameters.InName
member.summary: Returns only tags whose name contains the given parameter

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetUserQueryParameters.OrderBy
member.summary: Order the return users by Ascending or Descending

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetUserQueryParameters.SortBy
member.summary: Sort the returned users by the given parameter.

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetUserQueryParameters.InUserName
member.summary: Returns only users whose username contains the given parameter

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetUserQueryParameters.FromRegistrationDate
member.summary: Returns only users whose register date is more recent or equal to the given parameter

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetUserQueryParameters.ToRegistrationDate
member.summary: Returns only users whose register date is older or equal to the given parameter

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetUserQueryParameters.FromLastLoginDate

member.name: P:BlogCoreAPI.Models.Queries.GetUserQueryParameters.ToLastLoginDate
member.summary: Returns only users whose last login date is older or equal to the given parameter
